毣字的基本解释

毣
mù
美好。
〔毣毣〕思念的样子，如“愿赐数刻之间，极竭毣毣之思。”
毛湿。

毣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mù］
［《廣韻》莫卜切，入屋，明。］
［《廣韻》莫角切，入覺，明。］
见“毣毣”。

毣字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【毛字部】　毣； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页592第36
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?莫卜切，音木。思貌。一曰好也。【揚子·方言】純毣，好也。【郭璞曰】毣毣，小好貌。【前漢·鮑宣傳】願賜數刻之閒，極竭毣毣之思。【註】師古曰：毣音沐，沐沐猶蒙蒙也。如淳曰：謹愿之貌。　又風貌。【柳宗元·龍城錄】台人旣辭去，舟回如飛，但覺風毣毣而過。　又【玉篇】一曰毛濕也。　又【廣韻】莫角切【集韻】墨角切，?音邈。義同。　又【集韻】莫報切，音帽。與眊同。【說文】目少精也。

毣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
毣字的起名意思

表示美好或思念的样子，如“愿赐数刻之间，极竭毣毣之思。”。

毣
Basic explanation of words
毣
mù
Beautiful.
〔毣毣]The way of thinking is like "I wish to give a few moments, extremely exhausted thoughts."
The hair is wet.
毣
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mù］
["Guangyun" Mo Buqie, enter the house, Ming. ]
["Guang Yun" Mo Jiao cuts, enters the senses, and illuminates. ]
See "毣毣".
毣
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Mao Character Department] 　毣; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 592 36
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Mobuqie, sound wood. Thinking appearance. One said it was good. [Yangtze Dialect] It's pure, so good. [Guo Pu said] 毣毣, small and good-looking. [Previous Han·Bao Propaganda] I would like to give a few moments of leisure and exhaustion of thinking. [Note] Shi Gu said: "Mu Yin Mu, Mu Mu is still indistinct." Ruchun said: I would like to look.　Another style. [Liu Zongyuan·Longcheng Record] The Taiwanese resigned and the boat flew back, but felt the wind passed by.　[Jade Chapter] One said that the hair is wet.　 [Guang Yun] Mo Jiao cut [Ji Yun] Mo Jiao cut,? Yin Miao. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Don’t report to you, sound cap. Same as 眊. [Said the text] The eye is less precise.

Old glyph
毣
Name meaning
Indicates a beautiful or longing look, such as "I wish to give a few moments, extremely exhausted thinking.".
